changelog: UI SCALING: Added manual interface resizing in settings for improved clarity across all monitor resolutions.
SHORTCUT SUPPORT: Introduced .lnk file support with automatic parameter import for easier profile setup.
DRAG & DROP REORDERING: Added the ability to change application order by dragging items on the list.
PATH RECOVERY: Improved application path verification with manual repair options for portable software.
DISPLAY BUGFIX: Resolved rendering issues occurring on specific screen resolution configurations.
PARAMETER BUGFIX: Fixed an issue where launch parameters were not being saved in profile settings.
GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS: Various visual refinements and a multitude of other minor stability and performance fixes.
